duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and lead the Platform Solutions team to plan, conduct, and coordinate business programming applications activities for Enterprise Planning, HRIS, Salesforce Platform, and other applications.
Prepare feasibility studies and cost estimates for new data processing applications or revisions to existing systems.
Establish programming standards, program documentation requirements, and review current status of system applications for recommendations and improvements.
Supervise staff to ensure successful project delivery, service request fulfillment, and client satisfaction.
Coordinate and align HAEA resources to support KMA and HMA IT initiatives.
Establish personnel development plans, provide training and project opportunities, and ensure adherence to company policy and procedures.
Manage the work efforts of supervisors/individual contributors, responsible for hiring, firing, performance appraisals, and pay reviews.
Make decisions based on unit objectives, company policies, and procedures, and work on issues of diverse scope where analysis of situation or data requires evaluation of a variety of factors.

Follow processes and operational policies, act as an advisor to subordinate(s) to meet schedules and/or resolve technical problems, and develop and administer schedules with possible budget responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: BS / BA degree in business, information systems, or related field (Master's preferred)
10 years experience in system implementation or maintenance
5+ years experience as a manager or PM, preferably in the automobile industry
Good inter-personal skill and good organizing and analytical skill
